name: phonebook-backend
description: basic backend for my phone book app

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstack-part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy: git push heroku master && heroku open
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
